column2: Oh, hi. My name is Alfreda. I am Tybalt's daughter.
Oh, hello there. You are a new face here. Tell me some interesting story. Do you want some ale?
Here you are. It's on the house. [You gave a mug of ale]
Well, you know. This town is quite boring. Just tell me something fun.
(You told Alfreda about your world. Alfreda seems to be very interested.)
